following stack trace:

Duplicate of bug 202. Jared, can you reproduce this? If so, which projects do 
you add to an empty workspace to make it happen? We have seen this sporadically 
but have never had a reproducable test case.

Expanding the project in the repository view and *then* performing a CVS
operation on it (add to workspace or synchronize with stream) makes this problem
go away. It's silly, but if I don't expand the projects in the repository view,
I get this error almost always, but I've never received the error after
expanding them. Hopefully, that's a clue.

Regarding reproducability, we (MIN) get this error everytime we catch up with
our repository in OTT (extssh). We select three projects (org.eclipse.debug.core
".".debug.ui, and ".".jdt.debug), choose "synchronize with stream," and get this
error on one of the projects 99% of the time.
*** Bug 5106 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
